skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ev charger
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enhance your EV charging experience with Elecq Home and Alexa. Use simple voice commands to control the charger, check charging status, and more.

Features:
- Voice Control: Easily start and stop charging, check charged mileage, and see how long it has been charging.
- Status Updates:Check the current charging status.
- Convenience:Manage your charging hands-free with Alexa.

Requirements:
- Hardware:Elecq Home charger is required.
- Account:An Elecq Home account is needed.
- Alexa Device:Compatible with all Alexa-enabled devices.

Getting Started Guide:
1. Install your Elecq Home charger and set up your Elecq account.
2. Enable the Elecq Home skill in the Alexa app.
3. Link your Elecq account with Alexa.
4. Use voice commands to manage your EV charging.

Supported Commands:
“Alexa, ask EV charger to start Charging.”
“Alexa, ask EV charger to stop Charging.”
“Alexa, get the charging status from EV Charger.”
“Alexa, ask EV Charger how much power has been added so far.”
“Alexa, ask EV Charger how long it has been charging.”
“Alexa, ask EV Charger how many miles have been charged.”
“Alexa, what's the Ev Charger charging status？”


Elecq Home makes charging your EV efficient and convenient, all with just a command.
